meanings.definition: The quality or state of being at or reaching the highest point.
meanings.sent1: The peakiness of the mountain was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The peakiness of the roof made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The peakiness of the cake made it look like a delicious mountain.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement reached peakiness when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The peakiness of the roller coaster made it thrilling to ride.

meanings.definition: The state of being pointed or sharp.
meanings.sent1: The peakiness of the pencil tip made it perfect for drawing fine lines.
meanings.sent2: The peakiness of the thorn made it dangerous to touch.
meanings.sent3: The peakiness of the ice cream cone made it easy to scoop.
meanings.sent4: His words had a peakiness that could hurt feelings.
meanings.sent5: The peakiness of the knife made it ideal for cutting through tough meat.

meanings.definition: The state of being at the most intense or extreme level.
meanings.sent1: The peakiness of her anger was evident in her raised voice.
meanings.sent2: The peakiness of the storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent3: The peakiness of the competition made it exciting to watch.
meanings.sent4: The peakiness of the music filled the room with energy.
meanings.sent5: The peakiness of his fear paralyzed him in place.
